desc: Stop your trailer or caravan from being stolen. Thief’s hate strong anti thief devices. Coupling locks that secure your trailer/caravan to your location.

layout.text: Hitchpost ultimate caravan and trailer coupling lock

Very easy to use and designed to take the weight off the jockey wheel.
Made from 5mm Aluminium with a lock that is extremely hard to remove.  It's over designed to make it difficult to cut off or remove without the key.  The Hitchpost is the only trailer or caravan lock that can be fastened to the ground.
Proudly New Zealand Made
